name: WireShark OUI
description: Lookup Organizationally Unique Identifiers (OUIs) from the Wireshark "manuf" database file

options.name: Automatically Update OUI Database
options.description: If enabled, the integration will automatically update the OUI database from Wireshark's download server once a week. Defaults to enabled.

options.name: Always return results
options.description: If enabled, the integration will return a result even if the MAC address has no vendor assignment.  Defaults to enabled.
